Text:
thx for the comment but there are two versions ??


amazon uk...review

Some reviews here, list the collection as containing 27 episodes. This is incorrect. The US version does contain the 27 episodes mentioned (with a run time of 618 minutes). This UK version, contains only 20 episodes (with a run time of 460 minutes). I was quite disappointed when I received this, as I thought it was the same as the US release (with 27 episodes). The US version, which looks identical to this, is titled "Volume 1 - Episodes 1-27". This UK version is entitled "First Collection". Both sets contain 3 discs, however, as mentioned, The UK version does not have the same amount of episodes.
Anybody know where I can find all four seasons (100 episodes) of DuckTales?  It'd be greatly appreciated.
The 4th episode has been edited to end in a really dickomve way...
Its too bad that the subtitles are hardcoded
Good but subtitles makes it disappointing.
